metadata.title: Bio-Active Omega 3, 6, 7, 9, 1 oz (30 g)
description: Bio-Active Omega 3, 6, 7, 9 Helpful Healing 35, 000 IU Anti-Aging Antioxidant Fortified Super Moisturizing Multi-Functional Cold pHusion This antioxidant Vitamin E Lotion delivers long-lasting moisture and helps to minimize fine lines while improving skin tone and texture. Fortified with Coconut Water, Aloe Vera Gel and Green Tea for rapid Hydration, and synergistic Vitamins A & C with Alpha Lipoic Acid. Organic Cocoa Butter and Organic Shea Butter rapidly smoothes and soothes your skin, and are great for helping scars and stretch marks be less noticeable. 25,000 IU Vitamin E, using E Esters, a blend of bio-active Natural Tocopherols and Tocotrienols, plus 10,000 IU Vitamin A (100 g) will help to renew moisture and promote natural healing to maintain smooth, youthful looking skin.
